channel.item: Essay #4 Part #1: Web Design Notes https://www.haydenshuker.com//e4p1-webdesign-notes.html I wrote this complaint about bloated web design for the temple race car club marketing department. I want to publish it properly but it still feels unfinished. I've authored it as a dangling part one to represent that.
